name: .HG
summary: Learn about .HG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open HG files with Hello Games No Man’s Sky. HG files are used exclusively by No Man’s Sky and are not compatible with other games.

HG files are not meant to be manually edited. However, game modders may use third-party tools, such as goatfungus NMSSaveEditor, to view or modify the save data. Remember that editing these files incorrectly may lead to them becoming corrupt.
